availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Shelby County, Tennessee native. Son of Bennett Henderson and Catherine Henderson. Enlisted in Company M, 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry on August 14, 1863 at Cadiz, Kentucky, and discharged on December 24, 1863. Recommended Captain of a home guard company for Caldwell and Trigg counties on December 24, 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District One.
